meanings.definition: A traditional Korean dish made of fermented vegetables, typically cabbage and radishes, seasoned with chili peppers and other spices.
meanings.sent1: My mom makes delicious kimchi with cabbage and radishes.
meanings.sent2: In Korea, kimchi is a popular side dish served with every meal.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled kimchi on my shirt, and now it smells spicy!
meanings.sent4: The flavors in kimchi dance on my taste buds like a fiery celebration.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of kimchi make it look like a party on a plate.

meanings.definition: The process of making kimchi involves salting and fermenting vegetables.
meanings.sent1: Grandma taught me the traditional method of making kimchi with salt and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The art of kimchi-making requires patience and attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: I tried to speed up the kimchi fermentation process by using a hairdryer!
meanings.sent4: The kitchen smelled like a kimchi factory as the vegetables fermented.
meanings.sent5: The bubbling jars of kimchi looked like a science experiment in progress.
